entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
